ProcessPool - Class in it.disi.unitn.json.processpool
This class is used to create a thread pool which will be used to execute a specified number of threads.
ProcessPool(File, String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class it.disi.unitn.json.processpool.ProcessPool
This constructor creates a new thread pool which will be used to execute a specified number of threads. //* @param num The number of threads to be executed //* @param keepAliveTime when the number of threads is greater than the core, this is the maximum time that excess //* idle threads will wait for new tasks before terminating //* @param tu the time unit for the keepAliveTime argument
